videos.title: Day 2 of speedrunning Mythic without creatures  United Artifacts
videos.description:
It's day 2 of the creatureless mythic run and we have a new deck - United Battlefront Azorius Artifacts

Deck tech video https://youtu.be/qA9mqEBvwCE?si=NR2cmpaitEEHkENH

Decklist - https://moxfield.com/decks/JGfMEc47DkunqXW1WIygkQ

videos.author: CovertGoBlue
videos.title: Getting Mythic without casting a single creature  Cat Pact
videos.description:
I am climbing to mythic without casting a single creature spell.  My first deck is Demonic Pact / Harmless Offering combo.

More Cat/Pact combo - https://youtu.be/dxovRMj9b5I

Decklist - https://moxfield.com/decks/C6LWdu6xzUeGqHS5c0G42w
